article_title: Stock your fridge locally for barbeque season
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

It's barbeque season, so it's time to fill up the fridge with things to throw on the grill!

You don't have to go too far to find quality meat, because J. L. Miller Sons has all your grilling needs...right down to the barbeque sauce!

If you're wondering where you can pick up these beefy delicacies, check out the video.
